text: Hi, anyone else experiencing a bug right now in the design manager? A lot of the code is just white, looks like something to do with HubL comments not working?

Same, it's not the first time I've noticed this behavior.
Also, a few days ago I realized that the equal sign in html files was rendered as kind of "collapsed", like the two dashes were much closer to each other than usual. Strangely enough, zooming the page in/out other than 100% would resolve the issue...
Has anyone done any HubSpot integrations from LeadConduit/ActiveProspect?
can you add a new contact to a static list thru and api call?

API / Add contacts to a static list
<https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/user/viewprofilepage/user-id/175253|@AbdelMOULIDA> , the contact needs to exist before you can add it to the list.
I have a third party platform that is building our company an integration using API Calls. There is an issue with one of the actions created by the API Call...how do we get this issue resolved?

Hello :wave::skin-tone-3:

I’m looking for the page that goes over how to create a static team member page. The current <https://designers.HubSpot.com/docs/tutorials/lets-build-a-team-page-with-hubdb?_ga=2.161945084.1792201558.1685029364-190732094.1685029364&_gl=1*1hsvgim*_ga*MTkwNzMyMDk0LjE2ODUwMjkzNjQ.*_ga_LXTM6CQ0XK*MTY4NTAyOTM2NC4xLjEuMTY4NTAyOTU1Ni4xMS4wLjA.|link> is broken and returns a 404. If anyone knows where that tutorial is, I’d be appreciative if they could point me in the right direction.
Is there a way to run a report of the potential duplicate records from the data quality menu?
Does anyone have any experience pushing CTA events and page view events from HubSpot to Salesforce?
Can anyone help me, I want to trigger an update webhook on Contact properties, which event should i select along with its value?
Also let me know which event to trigger to delete a contact webhook
